name: 180 Degrees at Brown University
description: Brown’s 180 Degrees Consultants partner with non-profits and social enterprises within the local Providence community, supporting them to achieve and expand their goals.

name: AI Robotics Ethics Society
description: Our main goal is to help students consider AI ethics before they move into industry.

name: Alzheimer's Activists
description: The mission of Brown Alzheimer’s Activists is to promote the advocacy of Alzheimer’s disease.

name: American Civil Liberties Union
description: We are a campus chapter of the RI ACLU, dedicated to civil liberties education and advocacy on campus and in the community.

name: Best Buddies at Brown
description: We are the Brown University chapter of Best Buddies, a nonprofit committed to the social integration of people with intellectual and developmental disabilities.

name: Bear Necessities
description: The Bear Necessities is Brown’s all-suspendered, all-homie acapella group, specializing in tenor-bass vocal performance.

name: Better World By Design
description: BWxD is a student-led initiative at Brown University and RISD that celebrates the interdisciplinary collaboration between designers, educators, and innovators.

name: Every Vote Counts
description: EVC Brown is the Brown branch of a national organization dedicated to democracy, voting rights, and civic engagement, on campuses and in broader communities.

name: Brown Journal of World Affairs
description: The Brown Journal of World Affairs is a 28 year-old, entirely student-run biannual publication that bridges the gap between academic discourse and mainstream media.

name: Disney A Cappella
description: We sing a cappella arrangements of Disney songs!

name: Entrepreneurship Program
description: Brown EP is a student-led entrepreneurship initiative backed by the Nelson Center for Entrepreneurship.

name: Intercollegiate Finance Journal
description: The Intercollegiate Finance Journal is an economic, finance, and political journal dedicated to making content that is fresh and fun.

name: Jabberwocks
description: We are an all-gender and all-voice parts a cappella group that performs both for the Brown community and for audiences all over the world.

name: Latinx Student Union
description: Latinx Student Union hopes to highlight the diverse experiences, cultures, identities, and histories that live within our Latinx heritage.

name: Korean American Students Association
description: The Korean-American Students Association, KASA, is a minority-student run organization with the goals of strengthening the Korean/Korean-American community.
